title: Political Ideologies
description: How well do you understand the major political ideologies that have shaped world history?

questions.question: Which political ideology emphasizes individual liberty, free markets, and limited government?
Marxism, the foundation of communist ideology, was developed by Karl Marx and which co-author?
Which political ideology advocates for collective ownership of the means of production?
Fascism, as practiced in 1930s Italy, was led by which dictator?
Anarchism advocates for what kind of society?
options: A society with a strong central government
A society without government or involuntary hierarchies
A society governed by religious law
A society ruled by the military

questions.question: Which political philosophy, associated with Edmund Burke, is considered the foundation of modern conservatism?
Libertarianism primarily advocates for what?
options: Maximum individual freedom and minimal state intervention

questions.question: Social democracy, prevalent in Scandinavian countries, combines what two elements?
options: Capitalism with a strong social safety net

questions.question: Nationalism as a political ideology emphasizes loyalty and devotion to what?
Which ideology promotes the idea that environmental protection should be central to political decision-making?
Populism is characterized by an appeal to whom against a perceived elite?
Which philosopher wrote 'Leviathan,' arguing for a strong central authority to prevent societal chaos?
Feminism as a political movement primarily seeks what?
options: Equal rights and opportunities regardless of gender

questions.question: Theocracy is a system where political authority derives from what source?
